abilities.name: Flame Vapor
abilities.effect: When you play Gyarados from your hand to evolve your Active Pokémon, you may flip 2 coins. For each heads, discard an Energy card attached to the Defending Pokémon.

attacks.name: Dragon's Vengeance
attacks.effect: If Gyarados has 7 or more damage counters on it, this attack's base damage is 100.
